sentences.sContent: They receive a grant of £1,094 to cover the cost of miscellaneous expenses.
sentences.sCn: 他们获得1,094英镑的津贴用于支付各种开支。

synos.tran: [经]混杂的，各种各样的；多方面的，多才多艺的

phrases.pCn: 杂项工具，其他气动工具

trans.tranCn: 混杂的； 多方面的； 多才多艺的
trans.tranOther: a miscellaneous set of things or people includes many different things or people that do not seem to be connected with each other
